授業目的: This course is designed to provide basic knowledge of Chinese economy focusing on the mechanism of rapid development for last four decades. The contents of the course include the economic development of People's Republic of China since 1949 and the transformation of Chinese economy under the reform and opening-up policy since the late-1970s. We will study various issues of China's economic development such as rapid development of manufacturing sector, the reform of State-owned Enterprises, innovation in rural organization and agriculture, population growth and aging, the change in labor market and international trade.
到達目標: By the end of the course, students are expected:- To have clear understanding on China's economic history as a whole; - To examine the mechanism of rapid economy development in China using several economic models;- To explain on-going Chinese economic events and phenomena utilizing theoretical framework.
